ygData.subject: PGT vs. Barbed Leather Whip....
ygData.msgSnippet: I know this has been gone over already, but since now that I am getting close to the affording range I would like some more Info on it.  My stats right now
ygData.messageBody:
I know this has been gone over already, but since now that I am getting close to the affording range I would like some more Info on it. My stats right now are: 104 strength (big improvement over 85 eh?) 94 agility, 111dex, 90 charisma, 80 int, 60 wisdom.
Because I am moving onto mobs that carry pricier loot and I in turn am racking up more cash I have to wonder once again, which is better for me? The Polished Granite Tomahawk, or the Barbed Leather whip? I have asked a number of high level bards on my server, and have gotten conflicting answers... I have been leaning over to the Barbed Leather whip side of things, but because I have a pretty good dex I was wondering if maybe because I would proc more on the PGT, the tommy would be a better choice. I have got about 80pp in the bank right now, but I have started working on Lake Rathe and Permafrost, and have been getting sizable donations for healing and Taxi rides, as well as Teaching Elder dragon, and a friend of mine and I are starting a heavy duty jewelering biz, so My new fortune is not far off.

Thank you for all your help, and please don't over reply to this... I would hate to start a Giant thread.

Gleeman, Bard of the 17th Level - Karana
Long Live the Star Gazers!
p.s. A guildmate of mine gave me the BI crown he looted off a Goblin Warlord for trade for my Bronze helm! I nearly pissed myself when he offered the trade...
